statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 5 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -7 \\ -9 \\ 18 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
